root.name: Law & Order: Justice is Served
root.description: Law and Order: Justice is served is the third point and click game from Legacy Interactive based on the popular TV series. For the first half of the game you play as a detective working with Lennie Briscoe and Ed Green to find the murderer of an up and coming tennis star who was found dead on a locker room floor. With a forensics, research and surveillance team at your disposal, you must gather clues, solve puzzles, interview suspects and put together a case to expose the culprit(s).Once you have made your arrest you move on to working with D.A Serena Southerlyn to put together a good enough case to nail a guilty verdict. Just as with the TV series this is never as easy as it sounds as you must defend the legitimacy of your evidence and witnesses from the defendants lawyer.
